page.title: 37A day in the life
page.content:
Today I woke up and went downstairs and went to get some breakfast. I had Cheerios. I was so scared as today I was in a Kung Fu tournament. It started at 11 am and finished at 5pm.

It was 10am, I needed to get dressed so I woke up my dad. He said “Quick get your belt.” So I got it and we left.

The first match was against a Chinese boy. I won. There were lots of matches, I won all of mine.

It was the final against a Russian. In the first round he knocked me down but I got back up. In the second round I was angry so I hit him in the stomach and the face. The referee said enough, it was a T.K.O. I won my knuckles were hurting badley.

when we got home I ran up stairs and went to bed.


Pupil- Montbelle School
